description: Episode number 13 of Series "Not suitable for adults". Is there life after puberty? This program examines through a series of comic sketches and original songs, the fears and expectations of teenagers as they anticipate leaving school. The future is seen not only as a time of adventure, but uncertainty, where key decisions must be made. School, life at work and the responsibilities of being an adult are highlighted.
